Squizzy::

She contemplated on whether or not to tell him. "Well, I don't know 
how to tell you this." she stopped and walked over to the body of 
Beholder. It was covered by a sheet, so he couldn't see what or who 
was under it.

"You were..uh...killed. And I recreated you and brought you back. 
It's a little tough to understand. But I had to clone your old body, 
then I up loaded your old memories. So, basically, your you, but in a 
newer verson of your older self. Do you understand so far?"

She went over to the console and got the restraining field ready, 
just in case he went crazy from what she had just told him.
